I posted this previously. NBC Universal didn't like the Louis CK clip I used so I edited it out. Everything else is the same. 

Unfortunately all the comments are lost I guess. Sorry about this. I'm still learning the ropes of YouTube.

Matt Dillahunty and Jordan Peterson https://youtu.be/FmH7JUeVQb8
